synopsis.native: Un anniversario importante e purtroppo attuale. 80 anni fa, la popolazione italiana che non aveva una tradizione antisemita, fu spinta dalla propaganda fascista ad accettare la persecuzione di una minoranza, che viveva in Italia da secoli.
synopsis.english: 1938 - 2018: Eighty years after the Promulgation of the Fascist Racial Laws: an important and unfortunately very topical anniversary. Eighty years ago, Italian population, who had not a tradition of anti-Semitism, was pushed by the fascist propaganda into accepting the persecution of a minority, which had been living in Italy for centuries.
